RE: License #: CB730236853
AA Swartz Adoption Attorneys and Child Placing Age
4371 State Street
Saginaw, MI 48603
Dear Ms. Wolohan:
Your Child Placing Agency license is renewed. It is valid only at your present address
and is nontransferable. If you move, please notify us at least 30 days in advance.
You will be receiving the license in the mail. Please review it for accuracy.
Please review the enclosed documentation for accuracy and contact me with any
questions. In the event that I am not available, and you need to speak to someone
immediately, please contact the area manager at (269) 337-5289.
Sincerely,
Mark R. Hunter, Licensing Consultant
MDHHS\Division of Child Welfare Licensing
411 Genesee
P.O. Box 5070
Saginaw, MI 48605
(989) 395-2847

III. DESCRIPTION OF FINDINGS
1.) The facility is in compliance with all applicable rules and statutes.
2.) Any violation listed in section 1 is also an MISEP violation. Please note that there
are additional MISEP requirements that may not be included in section 1. The
facility is in compliance will all additional MISEP requirements except for the
following:
The agency does not serve plaintiff class youth, therefore MISEP does not apply.
3.) Any violation listed in section 1 is also a DHHS Contract violation. Please note that
there are additional DHS Contract/Policy requirements that may not be included in
section 1. The facility is in compliance will all additional DHHS Contract/Policy
requirements except for the following:
This agency does not have a DHHS contract.
IV. TECHNICAL ASSISTANCE
The facility was offered technical assistance in the following areas:
None needed.
V. CONSULTATION
The facility was offered consultation in the following areas:
None needed.
VI. EVALUATION OF RENEWAL PERIOD
There were no substantiated incidents of maltreatment in care during this licensing
period.
The agency has submitted one acceptable corrective action plan not related to
maltreatment during this licensing period.
The agency had one citation for the interim evaluation completed 08/24/2020. The
one citation was R 400.12605. The agency currently has a variance dated
12/09/2020 that allows for up to 150 days instead of 90 days to complete an
evaluation from the time of an application acceptance. There were no violations
cited as a part of this renewal evaluation.
2

VII. RECOMMENDATION
Based on inspection findings the facility is in compliance with all applicable licensing
statutes and rules and/or MISEP requirements and/or contract and policy. It is
recommended that the facility be issued a renewal of their regular license.
08/06/2021
